its a fresh coat of paint for the first game in the franchise the issue is that the gameplay and story elements are very dated they tried to improve the latter by adding some extra cutscenes at the end of each chapter but it isnt enough i think i enjoyed a decent amount of the game especially majima but its a very tough sell to a modern audience so its a weak recommend if you understand what youre getting into
